column2: Role & responsibilities     This is a full-time on-site role for a Fire Marshal at Poddar Diamonds in Mumbai. The Fire Marshall will be responsible for the day-to-day tasks associated with fire prevention, life safety, fire protection, fire safety, and fire suppression systems.   Qualifications Fire Prevention, Life Safety, and Fire Protection skills Knowledge of fire safety regulations and procedures Experience with fire suppression systems Strong problem-solving and decision-making skills Ability to remain calm under pressure Excellent communication and interpersonal skills Attention to detail and strong observation skills Fire safety certification or training
